Class Club

  • java.lang.Object
    • Club
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Club>

    public class Club
extends Object
implements Comparable<Club>
    The Club class is used to create and modify club objects. Players can then be added to the club
    Author:
    Gary Carr

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Club(String clubName, String stadium)
      The constructor for Club class takes the name and stadium name and then checks that the club name is entered in a valid format.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Club

        public Club(String clubName,
    String stadium)
        The constructor for Club class takes the name and stadium name and then checks that the club name is entered in a valid format. An ArrayList to hold players is also initialized
        Parameters:
        clubName - This is the user inputted name of the club
        stadium - This is the user inputted name of the stadium, required as all the clubs home matches will be set their by default

    • Method Detail

      • addClubPlayers

        public void addClubPlayers(Player squadMember)
        Method takes a player and adds them to an ArrayList of the clubs current squad
        Parameters:
        squadMember - This takes a player object to add to an ArrayList of players

      • addGoalsConceded

        public void addGoalsConceded(int gc)
        Method adds points to the clubs total goals conceded tally. Can be inputted by user or is accessed from the Match class - confirmResults method.
        Parameters:
        gc - This adds to the clubs current total goals conceded tally

      • addGoalsScored

        public void addGoalsScored(int gs)
        Method adds points to the clubs total goals scored tally. Can be inputted by user or is accessed from the Match class - confirmResults method.
        Parameters:
        gs - This adds to the clubs current total goals tally

      • addHomeMatch

        public void addHomeMatch(Club c)
        Whenever a home match for this club is set the opposition club are added to the homeMatches ArrayList. This is used by the Match class to ensure that duplicate fixtures cannot occur during a season
        Parameters:
        c - This is the opposition club

      • addMatchFigures

        public void addMatchFigures(int w,
                   int d,
                   int l)
        Method takes parameters from the Match class - confirmResults method. When a final result is confirmed it updates matches played, won, lost and drawn statistics. It is used for the visual display of the league table
        Parameters:
        w - This increases the number of games won depending on the results of the match
        d - This increases the number of games drawn depending on the results of the match
        l - This increases the number of games lost depending on the results of the match

      • addPointsTally

        public void addPointsTally(int p)
        Method adds points to the clubs total points tally. Can be inputted by user or is updated by the confirmResults method in Match
        Parameters:
        p - This adds to the clubs current total points tally

      • clubDetails

        public String clubDetails()
        Method creates a short summary of the clubs statistics
        Returns:
        Returns the statistics of the team as a block of text

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Club club)
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<Club>

      • getAverageAge

        public double getAverageAge()
        Method adds up the age of all players in the squad and then divides by the number of players to give an average
        Returns:
        Returns the average age of the squad

      • getAverageHeight

        public double getAverageHeight()
        Method returns the average height of the club by extracting the height of each Player contained in squad, adding it together, then dividing by the size of the squad
        Returns:
        Returns the average height of the current squad

      • getClubName

        public String getClubName()
        Method returns the clubs name
        Returns:
        Returns the name of the club

      • getGoalDifference

        public int getGoalDifference()
        Method returns the clubs goal difference
        Returns:
        Returns clubs current goal difference

      • getHomeMatches

        public ArrayList<Club> getHomeMatches()
        Method checks if this club has already played another club. It is accessed from the match class to check fixtures are not duplicated
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of the clubs home games so far

      • getPlayerItem

        public Player getPlayerItem(int selectPlayer,
                   Club c,
                   League l)
        Method is accessed through the console IO when choosing a player to modify within an squad
        Parameters:
        selectPlayer - This is the player from the squad that has been chosen from the user through the IO
        c - This is the club the player belongs to
        l - This is the league the club belongs to
        Returns:
        Returns the player selected
